hooks.name: useDemoContext

antiPatterns.message: Console statements found in production code
antiPatterns.suggestion: Use a proper logger or remove before production
Use environment variables for sensitive data

antiPatterns.message: Mock data or fake APIs detected
antiPatterns.suggestion: Replace with real API endpoints before production

interface.name: SampleResult

scripts.name: isl:gen
scripts.command: pnpm --filter @isl-lang/cli exec isl gen ts specs/
